content: Got to love when you are working on a project that needs a specific module and you start looking into it and realize you started porting it many months ago, probably when this project was first being scoped. Now for testing and polish I guess!
Haha, yes. More than once I've found myself looking at a module I needed, only to find myself listed as the current maintainer, or porter :big_smile:

Just now I was looking at the Insert module on a client's site wondering how to work out what File/Image fields it was enabled on. I thought "Wouldn't it be nice to have this displayed on, say, the /admin/reports/fields page... I'll make an issue for it!" Sure enough, I go to the Insert module's repo and discover that I'm the maintainer! :laughing:
